item.description:
Starter Sculling

Get out on the water!  Ever wonder what it is like to glide across the top of the water?  Cutting through the ocean as you take in some of the north shore’s most scenic settings.  Being in Marblehead we have a unique opportunity to take to the sea.  Join us!

In this program you will be introduced to the sport of sliding seat Olympic rowing.  You will learn the basics of the stroke and build your skills.

Classes take place in single Echo Open Water Rowing shells.  Each session runs six weeks with two 1 1/2 hour classes/week.

Price: Spring/Summer/Fall 6-week sessions: $325     

May 7- June 13 - Monday / Wednesday - 8:00 - 9:30 am

June 25 - August 1 - Monday / Wednesday - 7:00 - 8:30 am
June 26 - August 2 - Tuesday / Thursday - 5:30 - 7:00 am

August 6 - September 12 - Monday / Wednesday - 7:30 - 9:00 amam
August 7 - September 13 - Tuesday / Thursday - 6:00 am - 7:30

To register call: 781-990-3552
Sign-up on-line today to secure your seat!

Make checks payable to: Rowing For All LLC
Little Harbor Boathouse, 40 Doaks Lane, Marblehead, MA 01945

Be Strong • Live Well • Have Fun

group.name: Community Rowing & Paddling on Boston's North Shore Meetup

item.name: Adult Starter Rowing Program at Little Harbor Boathouse
